put.description: Updates the default currency for a specific user. Accepts 3-letter ISO currency codes.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to update

put.description: Updates the country for a specific user. Accepts both alpha-2 and alpha-3 country codes.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to update

get.description: Retrieves a single transaction by its unique ID.

put.description: Updates an existing transaction with the same validation rules as creation.

get.description: Retrieves a specific subscription by its ID for the authenticated user.

put.description: Updates an existing subscription for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes a subscription for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves a specific category by its ID for the authenticated user.

put.description: Updates an existing category for the authenticated user. Category names must remain unique per user.

delete.description: Deletes a category for the authenticated user. Category must not have child categories.

get.description: Retrieves transactions with filtering by userId, walletId, effectiveDate range, and transactionType. Supports pagination for large transaction volumes.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for date range filtering (yyyy-MM-dd)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for date range filtering (yyyy-MM-dd)

post.description: Creates a new transaction with validation rules based on transaction type. EXPENSE requires walletFrom, INCOME requires walletTo, TRANSFER requires at least one wallet.

get.description: Retrieves all subscriptions for the authenticated user, ordered by name.

post.description: Creates a new subscription for the authenticated user.

Processes a payment for a subscription. Creates a new EXPENSE transaction and updates the subscription's nextDueDate. Exchange rate is only used if subscription currency differs from wallet currency, otherwise it's ignored.

get.description: Retrieves all categories for the authenticated user, ordered by name.

post.description: Creates a new category for the authenticated user. Category names must be unique per user.

get.description: Retrieves a user by their username
Checks whether a user with the specified username exists
Retrieves the current authenticated user or creates a new one if it doesn't exist. This implements the core requirement to create users on first Keycloak token authentication.
Retrieves all transactions involving a specific wallet with pagination.
Retrieves transactions of a specific type (EXPENSE, INCOME, TRANSFER) with pagination.
Retrieves transactions within a specific date range with pagination.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for date range filtering (yyyy-MM-dd)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for date range filtering (yyyy-MM-dd)

get.description: Retrieves all transactions for the authenticated user without pagination. Use with caution for users with large transaction volumes.
Retrieves all child categories of a specific parent category for the authenticated user.
Retrieves all categories of a specific type (EXPENSE or INCOME) for the authenticated user.
Retrieves all root categories (categories without a parent) for the authenticated user.
Retrieves all categories for the authenticated user in hierarchical order (parents first, then children).
Retrieves all categories of a specific type for the authenticated user in hierarchical order.
Retrieves all categories with a specific color for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color to filter by (hex format, e.g., #A1B2C3)
